LanguageData.BiocodedMarketValuePercentLabel: Biocoded weapons retain {0}% of their value. (35% default)
LanguageData.BiocodedStealChancePercentLabel: Chance that a raider will steal biocoded weapons just to spite you: {0}% (2% default)
LanguageData.BiocodedStealChancePercentExplanation:
Note: This only matters if biocoded weapons retain a good portion of their value. In addition, this rolls for each biocoded weapon in range (12 tile radius), for each raider, for each "should we steal" check.
So assume 3 raiders break into a storeroom housing 2 biocoded weapons worth 999 Silver each, and 10 stacks of 500 Silver. In this scenario, the chance they will consider at least one biocoded weapon will be: 1 - (1 - {0})^(3 * 2) = {1}%
